title: Easy Thai peanut sauce
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons cornflour', '125ml cold water', '4 tablespoons reduced salt soy sauce', '130g smooth peanut butter', '4 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '1 tablespoon white vinegar', '2 teaspoons sesame oil', '250ml warm water', '4 tablespoons chopped peanuts (optional)', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh mint leaves (optional)']
